name: Decadent Thinking
description:
This game aims to be a kind of "reading" prescription for your mind!
I know how easily the human heart can be broken.
The way we as individuals deal with society.
I think I understand, in some small way, that it has become very difficult in today's world.

The pain of not being understood by others, the anxiety of society, and so on.
If only I could get rid of those vague things that make my chest tighten up by reading a text or playing a game. I made it because I thought it would be nice.
Also, I made it because I wrote it so well and I wanted to get paid for it (honest).
